com.tradersgem2.stock

Class StockMarketStock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tradersgem2.stock.Stock
      • com.tradersgem2.stock.StockMarketStock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class StockMarketStock
extends Stock
    The following class creates a stock with random market value and history; Since there is not enough time to create functions to bring the information directly form the internet, we are creating this randomly to represent the idea and functions; Furthermore, there is relevant use of this Class in the simulation phase, as random walks through the market can be created to simulate different scenarios;
    Author:
    Pedro + Luiz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
